articles.title: Maine CDC reports no new COVID cases because state lab was closed on Christmas - Press Herald
articles.description: The lab did not process samples Friday and other labs that typically report results to the public health agency also did not do so on the holiday.
articles.content:
No new coronavirus cases were reported Saturday in Maine because the state lab that processes test samples was closed Friday for the Christmas holiday.
